name: bt2.Image Sphere
author: mho.codus

sections.description:
Add 360 degree image-/panorama-/sphere-support to WordPress. This might be a absolut simple and working Plugin … and it is.

Well, this plugin was scripted for a customer and worked for him. I played around with some other 360° sources, browsers – worked.
U’ll find the default-section under the options-section.
sections.installation: This plugin comes out of the box. Just install, activate and enjoy. I added some very simple customize support.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • just scripted
  • tested with default browsers and different image-sources
